Decoy: A CD can be used as a decoy to distract insects or prey from real food sources.
Wall art: CD can be decorated with paint or other artistic materials and hung on the wall as a unique piece of art.
Game board: CD can be used as a board for games such as Connect Four or tic-tac-toe.
Magnifying glass: The reflective surface of the CD can be used to create a makeshift magnifying glass for reading or examining small objects.
Coin collector: CD can be used as a storage and organization for small coins, creating a unique and visually appealing collection.
